feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
